title: Art or a Felony
itunes:title: Art or a Felony
description:
Thursday 3/16- Today on the show phone lines opened up to discuss Snoop Dogg's risky music video that insinuated an assassination of President Donald Trump and Bow Wow tweeting disrespectful comments to Trump, which many did not see a problem with, but was it OK to do? Also, the phone lines opened up for Angela to give some advice to listeners for Ask Yee and Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Tyler Ray Price after snitching on himself of rape.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
